All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
com.varukha.webproject.command
This command package contains all required commands to execute by front-controller and utility classes: CommandName - contains names of commands.
com.varukha.webproject.command.impl.base
This implementation package contains base commands for all users.
com.varukha.webproject.command.impl.calculates
This implementation package contains calculation commands.
com.varukha.webproject.command.impl.manager
This implementation package contains manager commands.
com.varukha.webproject.command.impl.routs
This implementation package contains page routing commands.
com.varukha.webproject.command.impl.user
This implementation package contains authorized user commands.
com.varukha.webproject.controller
This controller package contains front-controller Controller and next packages: context - to create required instances filters - to filter requests listeners - to react on events tag - in order to use on jsp pages
com.varukha.webproject.controller.context
This context package contains all classes to properly set up and configure application context:
com.varukha.webproject.controller.filters
This filters package contains all filters that using before application start EncodingFilter - in order to set up encoding.
com.varukha.webproject.controller.listeners
This listeners package contains all listeners: ContextListener - in order to set up all required objects that used in application.
com.varukha.webproject.controller.tag
This is tag package contains all tags to use on jsp pages: HelloTag - in order to return greeting messages in depend on the user role.
com.varukha.webproject.exception
That exceptions package contain all required for correct work exceptions: DAOException throws exception in case of errors on Data Accesses layer.
com.varukha.webproject.model.connection
This package contains all classes that used to connect to MySQL database.
com.varukha.webproject.model.dao
This is DAO package.
com.varukha.webproject.model.dao.impl
This is DAO package for implementation contracts.
com.varukha.webproject.model.entity
This is entities package that contain objects to provide information inside application.
com.varukha.webproject.model.service
This is service package.
com.varukha.webproject.model.service.impl
This is service package for implementation contracts.
com.varukha.webproject.model.service.validation
 
com.varukha.webproject.util
This util package contain all classes with utility methods: DistanceCalculator used to provide distance calculations.
com.varukha.webproject.util.calculator
This calculator package contain all classes to calculate order price.
com.varukha.webproject.util.calculator.impl
This package contains methods for calculating price by order type and total delivery price.
com.varukha.webproject.util.calculator.util
This is package contain classes with trivial utility methods that take part in calculation delivery order price.
com.varukha.webproject.util.report
This report package contain all classes to create payment bill and reports in pdf format.
com.varukha.webproject.util.report.impl
This package contains methods for create: - payment bill, - report by definite days of cargo delivery, - report by destination deliver city (from/to).
com.varukha.webproject.util.report.util
This is package contain classes with trivial utility methods that take part in generating pdf reports.
com.varukha.webproject.util.validation
This is package contain validation classes to check input data for correctness.
